page.title: 06Shiney Row - My Village
page.content: My community is called Shiney Row, it is a small{village}and the people are friendly.It has lots of shops and everything we want is here. If not we either get the bus or travel in our cars to the Galleries in Washington In Shiney Row we have Starks DIY and a YMCA club where they hold{Galas}and famous people come like Ken Dodd and Rod Hull and Emu. A main road runs through our village and in the middle is a big roundabout, so lots of people pass through here in their{cars. Shiney Row is supposed to have been given its name from the visit of a member of the Royal Family in the 19th centuary who as they passed through was overheard to say "What a shiney row of houses".At that time Shiney Row was just a few houses around a pit. Today there are hundreds of houses but the only pit left is in Herrington.
